title: WTB: N28, N29, N162, N172, N300 HOFers
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: N28, N29, N162, N172, N300 HOFers
posts.post_content:
This November I am wanting to buy a selection of 19th Century HOFers and right now I am trying to get a sense of what might be available so I can prioritize, as I will not have the funds to purchase everything I want! Below is what I am looking for - my budget will require lower grades, in the 1-2 range. If you have anything you'd be open to selling in November, please send me a DM. Thank you!

Chris


N28 John Montgomery Ward
N28 Tim Keefe
N28 John Clarkson
N29 Buck Ewing 
N162 Goodwin Dan Brouthers
N172 Old Hoss Radbourn
N172 Pud Galvin 
N300 Billy Hamilton
N300 Amos Rusie
